title: Manfrotto MA LSS050M-XLBB Men's PRO Soft Shell Jacket - XL (Black)
features: Abrasion protection shoulder and elbow patches
Can be used with Pro Photo Vest as thermal protection
description: The Pro Soft Shell Jacket is the essential active shooting jacket. In extreme weather it will keep you warm while enabling you the freedom to continue to shoot freely. This wind resistant, breathable shell keeps the cold out, provides comfortable carrying for your camera and stores your camera accessories. Abrasion protection shoulder and elbow patches keep your camera from slipping off your shoulder. Side entry chest pockets expand internally to hold equipment such as cell phone, wallet, etc. Pocket for point-and-shoot camera. Thumb holes keep your hands warm when shooting. This can be used with the Pro Photo Vest as thermal protection (each item is sold separately). Materials: Polyester, Polyamide, Elastane. Size: XL.
